page.title: 18EDUCATION.HEALTH.EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: EDUCATION. There are two state schools Swallowfield Lower, and Fullbrook Middle School.Swallowfield opened in l98l replacing Aspley Heath Lower School built in l868. This site is presently being developed for old people's housing. Private schools are in Aspley Heath. EMPLOYMENT. The major employer is Plysu Ltd. a plastic manufacturing firm. Other employment is found in two garden centres local shops or offices. Milton Keynes Development Corporation and the Open University offer employment nearby and others work further away, commuting to London and elsewhere. HEALTH.Recently a purpose built dental surgery and a medical centre have opened catering for most health needs. Regular blood donor sessions are held in local halls.
